columns.People_ID: The unique identifier for each person in the table.
columns.Name: The full name of the person.
columns.Country: The country where the person resides.
columns.Is_Male: The gender of the person, denoted as T for male and F for female.
columns.Age: The age of the person in years.

people.table_description: The table is to track individuals associated with the wedding.

columns.Church_ID: The unique identifier for each church in the table.
columns.Name: The name of the church.
columns.Organized_by: The individual who organized the church.
columns.Open_Date: The year the church was established.
columns.Continuation_of: The church from which this church is a continuation.

church.table_description: The table is to record information about various churches.

columns.Church_ID: The unique identifier for the church involved in the wedding.
columns.Male_ID: The unique identifier for the male participant in the wedding.
columns.Female_ID: The unique identifier for the female participant in the wedding.
columns.Year: The year when the wedding took place.

wedding.table_description: The table is to register wedding events and associated participants.
